It really is a great game that holds up. The biggest downside to it is its poor autosave system; there are too few moments where save happens, trapping you into longer periods of gameplay when it's undesirable.

先说打斗机制和战斗系统很不错，游戏对玩家也很友好，死亡基本没有什么代价。画面也很不错，就算摆在今天也是很出彩。但是不得不说自带的繁体中文也就能用的水平，而且对于没有玩过前作的玩家就像我确实对剧情很多都不清楚一个是我断断续续玩的而且就是当成速食了，一个是文化背景还真得讲讲。最后最后，游戏莫名其妙就通关了？？？我当时完全傻的。最开始我是想着最后与Comstock来一个大对决最后胜利收官，妈耶但是确实没想到他被booker这简简单单就溺杀了。以为后来会是一场和真正的背后boss的大战，没想到啊没想到，开几个门最后被伊丽莎白溺死了。一脸迷惑后续剧情中，妈耶结束了？？？后来去b站看过全系列解说，嗯……确实很棒。决定重新玩一次，补齐dlc。

他们曾答应，将来带我们去月球；我希望现实也如这般无限，我想去看看，去看看那个他们没有解散的世界，我想看看那个月球上的乌托邦……

[The following review might contain spoiler, i'll keep it as less as possible]
The third game of the series, compared to the previous games it have improved gameplay-wise, here are the stuff i liked about it:
-[Combat]First of all the plasmid/vigor, now you can actually use all of them without having to switch them out for others here and then, which allowed for better combat experience, combos and such.
-[Combat]Second would be the melee, its a small addition most people probably only used like once or twice in the entire game (lol) but it is really neat.
-[Combat]Third would be the skylines, that's probably the part i liked the most, it enabled some fun stuff during combat and such.
-[Combat]Some may not like it but i actually find the way of recovering HP much better in this game, not having to spend too much currency for purchasing healthpacks, plus it makes killing enemy more rewarding as you can get healing item from them.
-[Combat]Shield, this actually forces the player to play around cover a bit more smartly, although rushing head-on is still viable.
-[Combat]The wide array of weapon is really great, aside from the burstgun i actually find most of them quite fun to use.
-[Combat]Weapon upgrade is much more easier, allows more weapon upgrade and utility.
-[Progressing]The hacking has been changed to just using possess, which saved a lot of time spent on staring at the screen and getting zapped.
-[Progressing]The introduction of mini-bosses is done really well, i like them.
-[Progressing]Ammos are quite easy to come across and picking up ammos for the gun is automatic if you're holding it, pretty neat.
-[Story]I love it, if a potato brain like mine can process it anyone can.
-[Gameplay]Atmosphere for each area is great as usual.
-[Gameplay]If you pay attention to the background music you can actually notice when the comabt have ended.

Now, the game is great and all but i still got to pick a few bones:
-Firstly, why the hell does vigor upgrade costs so much, and to make it worse the coins aren't the easiest to come across either.
-Second, the Handymen, its practically impossible to shake them off in areas without a skyline, plus they can't be stunned like the Big Daddies. I do like the boss, but the thing is dislike is how they only appear like around thrice the entire playthrough.
-Third is the heater gun, either i missed something or some part, i didn't see a proper introduction of the weapon until i randomly came across it almost at the end of the game.
-Lastly, the gears. I know i can change them when you first found it, but where the hell do i get to view all my gears?

That's about it, idk why you would read the entire thing but here it is, only take this as a reference though since experience differs for each person.
Combat:9/10    Story:9/10  , buy it during sales its much cheaper.

Great visuals, great designs, great story and narrative, fun combat, cool weapons, and great voice acting. The story is told and that's that - not much replayability after the fact, but the experience was still worth it. I really enjoyed the different vigor/weapon combinations that kept combat interesting throughout, and a couple of the levels were sufficiently large/interesting/different enough to make it cool. Skyhooks definitely makes it unique.

Прошел игру одним заходом. Отличная игра на вечерок. Концовка ломает твой мозг. Всем советую, если любите стрельбу как на Украине и не играли в предыдущие части.

Я прошел эту игру, и скажу честно, таких эмоций я давно не получал не в одной игре как в этой, ноут все таки дал возможность ее пройти до конца да на минимальних настройках, да в 640п при 30 кадрах в секунду, но я получил кайф от игрового процесса, сюжета, секретов, и достижений. Что нащет триквела с дополнениями, они круты лишь местами. 10/10 заслужено из за атмосферы, музыки, сюжета, отличной стрельбы.

In the last few months, I've completed the Bioshock Trilogy.
Bioshock Infinite is very different from the first two games. Not only the title is different, but the whole setting.
Your above the clouds instead of underwater, you play a different character, the color schemes are a lot brighter, etc.

+ gunplay is good
+ story is very good
+ visuals are still impressive (for a game from 2013)
+ I didn't experience any bugs

- too easy (just kidding, I recommend the highest difficulty. Normal difficulty feels like playing the other Bioshock games on easy mode).
- soundtrack could be more interesting (sometimes, for my taste)

I don't want to spoil the end of the story, but I warn you, it'll shock you. A must-play for fans of fps and story games (especially if you like the first two games of the franchise. However, I highly recommend to play them in order).

9/10

Unlike Bioshock (1 and 2), Bioshock Infinite events takes place earlier in the timeline sometime around late 1900s to early 1910s. The gameplay itself is similar to both Bioschock 1 and 2 with some minor differences with plasmids in Rapture we now have Vigor in Columbia, with guns we find a wide selection of arsenal with Blue weapons used by the authorities and Red weapons used by the Vox and unlike 1 and 2 the weapons we find in Columbia don't have different ammo types. 
The Story is a solid 10/10 for me and I have come to love our dear characters Booker and Elizabeth as they journey throughout Columbia and travelling through different "circumstances and possibilities"all throughout Columbia escaping Comstock's clutches with a huge twist in the end which kinda confused me a little bit but with some deep digging I managed to put two and two together.
I would definitely recommend this game as a must play in terms of story and narrative.
10/10

Good:
Pretty good shooter and story.
I didn't mind the two weapon system at all, it forced you to decide on playstyle preveniently.

Bad: 
The combat is kinda repetitive and lacks a variety of enemies.

The gameplay has some pacing and gameplay issues that many gamers might ignore while others will find mindly frustrating.
On top of that the main campaign completly neglects the storytelling and narrative that bioshock is famous for. However this game tells an emotional story and introduces nice twists like a good bioshock game should do. Thankfully many of the problems i had with the main campaign are not apparent in the 2 dlc that revolve around rapture .Its a good experience that is 100% worth its price when bought with the bioshock collection...

[h1]Bioshock Infinite[/h1]

Bioshock Infinite, kumar borcundan kurtulmak isteyen Booker Dewitt'den kumar borçlarının silinmesi karşılığında bir kızı getirmesinin istenilmesi ile başlar. Hikaye basit gözükse de oldukça derin. Hikayenin düğümü oyunun son kısımlarında iyice çözülüyor ancak hikayedeki bazı kısımlar soru işareti olarak kalıyor. Kendi zihninizde tamamlamalısınız.

Oyun birçok harika detaya sahip ve vermiş olduğu birtakım güzel mesajlar da mevcut. Örnek vermek gerekirse çevredeki diğer npcleri vurabilirsiniz ancak çocuklara zarar veremezsiniz. 

Elizabeth gibi harika, mükemmel detaylarla donatılmış en ince ayrıntısına kadar uğraşılmış bir yardımcı karakterimizin olması da oyunu çok daha eğlenceli hale getiriyor.

 Sinematikler gayet başarılı. Oyun 2013 yılında çıkmış olmasına rağmen grafikler taş gibi. 
Mekan tasarımları tek kelimeyle efsane, çevreyi inceleyince bir sürü harika detayın olduğunu da rahatlıkla söyleyebilirim.

Silah çeşitliliği iyi denilebilecek seviyede ve silahlar geliştirilebilir şekilde. Ayrıca ilerledikçe açabildiğimiz vigorlar ve donanabildiğimiz farklı özelliklere sahip kıyafetlerin olması da aksiyon kısmına renk katan güzel detaylardan.

 Olumsuz taraflardan bahsetmek gerekirse oyun bir açık dünya oyunu değil ve çizgisel ilerliyor açık dünya olsaydı daha iyi olabilirdi. Türkçe dil desteği yok yama mevcut ancak yamalarda da kasetlerin çevirisi yok ve kasetler de hikayeyi anlama kısmında büyük rol oynuyor. Ufak tefek buglar mevcut ama oynanışı etkilemiyor. 

Bioshock Infinite mükemmel atmosferi ve derin hikayesi ile herkesin deneyimlemesi gereken başarılı bir yapım, almanızı tavsiye ederim.
Masterpiece game that never ends. It has a golden story.
Magnifica Historia  Y graficasos Recomendado 10/10

Bioshock infinite é o terceiro jogo da franquia, mas não tem uma relação direta com os primeiros jogos. A ambientação desse jogo consegue ser melhor do que a dos primeiros, mostrando um mundo completamente novo do que a gente tinha visto antes, explorando conceitos diferentes e histórias diferentes. A mecânica desse jogo é muito boa, gameplay envolvente e missões bem legais de se fazer, o final é incrível e confuso mas vale a pena jogar demais. Se você for fã da franquia Bioshock esse jogo é uma real obra de arte e entrega tudo o que esta franquia precisava entrelaçando todos os bioshocks na dlc burial at the sea que até poderia ser vendido como um jogo completo. recomendo demais jogar não só esse jogo como a série inteira, por toda a diversão e experiência, Bioshock Infinite é um jogo impecável. 10/10

For someone who's never played BioShock before, I'd say this was an enjoyable experience. Though some design choices such as only allowing two guns to be held at any given time and slow inventory management seemed obscene to me, especially in a game that's based on high-octane action such as this. Nevertheless, I'd definitely recommend this game.
